title.bibl: Svenska Tribunen, Apr. 3, 1901. Concert by Viking Music Corps

div.bibl: Svenska Tribunen, Apr. 3, 1901. CONCERT BY VIKING MUSIC CORPS

body.p: p.11........A concert was given Saturday evening by the Viking Music Corps.

The Corps is well-known for its splendid music, and the lively boys had the satisfaction of playing to a large and enthusiastic audience. Of the seven numbers on the program four were rendered by the Music Corps. The other three were presented by Messrs. Harry Anderson and Gustaf Holm,whose renditions received warm applause.
A ball followed the concert program.
